meta_title: What is Depreciation? Industrial Definition & Impact
meta_description: Understand the definition of depreciation in an industrial context. This guide explains asset value loss, maintenance budget impacts, and lifecycle management.
title: Depreciate Definition: Industrial Asset Management

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Depreciate Definition: Industrial Asset Management

image_prompt: A high-angle, professional photo of a modern, clean industrial facility. In the foreground, a large, high-value CNC milling machine is in operation. A diverse team of two maintenance professionals in high-visibility vests and hard hats are standing nearby, one holding a digital tablet displaying asset performance charts. The lighting is bright and cinematic, emphasizing the scale and technical complexity of the machinery.
